alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 10:53AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1052 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking gusty showers along a line extending from Pennsuco to 6 miles north of Miccosukee Resort to near Fortymile Bend. Movement was northwest at 25 to 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Weston and Intersection Krome And U.S. 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County
